mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NUM, COMMENT_CONTENTS, REV_WRITE, REV_RESTNUM, MEMBER_NUM, REV_TASTE, REV_KIND, REV_FACILITY, REV_PRICE, REV_MOBILITY, REV_WAITING, REV_SPEED, REV_CLEAN, REV_REVISIT, REV_AVGSCORE, NICKNAME FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NUM=MEMBER_NUM) WHERE REV_RESTNUM = #{restNo} AND REVIEW.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( COMMENT_NUM, COMMENT_CONTENTS, REV_WRITE, REV_DELETE, REV_RESTNUM, MEMBER_NUM, REV_TASTE, REV_KIND, REV_FACILITY, REV_PRICE, REV_MOBILITY, REV_WAITING, REV_SPEED, REV_CLEAN, REV_REVISIT, REV_AVGSCORE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CMNO.NEXTVAL, #{commentContents}, SYSDATE, 'N', #{revRestnum}, #{memberNum}, #{revTaste}, #{revKind}, #{revFacility}, #{revPrice}, #{revMobility}, #{revWaiting}, #{revSpeed}, #{revClean}, #{revRevisit}, TO_NUMBER(ROUND((#{revTaste} + #{revKind} + #{revFacility} + #{revPrice} + #{revMobility} + #{revWaiting} + #{revSpeed} + #{revClean} + #{revRevisit}) / 9), 999999999), 'Y' )
